title: 820-2879 sensor issue
message:
Hello,
i am working on a 820-2879 that was waterdamaged. I cleaned it and it works again but sometimes it´s running really slow and the fan is ramping up all the way. I run ASD and when the fan gets loud it shows various sensor issues. If i run ASD again there are different Sensors failing and the reason why they fail is different too. The most common sensor failure is "SMC IO failed". Sometimes some sensors are also reading below the low limit or above the high limit. I attached a picture. Now i don´t know if it is a sensor, the SMC or something else. Thanks for any help.

title: 820-2879 sensor issue
message: Battery and CPU temp sensor are something totally different. The only common thing here is the SMC. I bet there is crap under it.

title: 820-2879 sensor issue
message: I gave the SMC a reflow ant now it seems to work. At least it runs now normally for around 1/2h. Before it was going crazy after 5 min or so. I´ll put it in the ultrasonic and if the problem comes back i let you know. Thank you for the great support
